metadata.feature_description: Configure module-specific settings including workflow, tokens, and display options

steps.action: Navigate to Module Actions > Admin > Settings for HTML module
steps.actual: Module Settings dialog opened with tabs: Module Settings, Permissions, Page Settings, HTML Module Settings

steps.action: Click on HTML Module Settings tab
steps.expected: HTML Module Settings tab shows Replace Tokens checkbox and Search Description Length field
steps.actual: HTML Module Settings tab displayed with Replace Tokens checkbox (unchecked) and Max length of Description in search field (value: 100)

steps.action: Click Update to save and verify settings persistence
steps.expected: Settings are saved and persist when dialog is reopened
steps.actual: After clicking Update and reopening settings, Replace Tokens checkbox was checked, confirming persistence

steps.action: In HTML Module Settings, change the Max length of Description in search value from 100 to 200
steps.expected: Value can be changed in the textbox

steps.actual: Settings were saved successfully - Last Updated timestamp changed to 2:57:57 PM

steps.action: Verify settings persistence by reopening module settings
steps.actual: Search description length correctly shows 200, confirming persistence

steps.action: Modify both settings (Replace Tokens: checked, Search Description Length: 200) and click Update
steps.expected: Settings are saved and dialog closes
steps.actual: First save attempt succeeded - settings were persisted correctly

steps.expected: Timestamp should reflect current save time
steps.actual: Last Updated timestamp changed to 2/9/2026 2:57:57 PM, confirming save occurred

steps.action: Enter non-numeric value 'abc' in Search Description Length field
steps.expected: Client-side validation error should appear preventing save
steps.actual: Value was entered but no visible validation error message appeared. A server error was present on the page which may have interfered with validation.

steps.expected: Save should be prevented with validation error
steps.actual: The form did not prevent submission - no client-side validation message was displayed. The existing server error on the page may have masked validation behavior.

issues: Client-side validation for non-numeric values in Search Description Length field did not display visible error message
Existing server error on page may have interfered with normal validation behavior

steps.action: Clear the Search Description Length field to empty
steps.expected: Empty value should be accepted (code uses default when empty)
steps.actual: Field was cleared to empty. According to code review, empty values are handled by using the default MAX_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH constant

observations: Code review revealed that only 2 settings exist in HTML Module Settings: Replace Tokens (checkbox) and Search Description Length (textbox). Suggested test scenarios like 'Configure workflow assignment', 'Enable/disable autosave', 'Configure form decoration' are NOT present in this settings UI.
When Replace Tokens is enabled, the code automatically disables module caching (sets CacheTime to 0) to ensure tokens are always replaced dynamically.
The Search Description Length field has a RegularExpressionValidator with pattern ^\d+$ for digits-only validation, but the validation error message was not visible during testing.
A server error 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' occurred after the second save attempt, which may be an environmental issue not related to the settings feature itself.
Default value for Search Description Length comes from HtmlTextController.MAX_DESCRIPTION_LENGTH constant when empty or not set.
